Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Necklace
Description: Necklace composed of beautiful white neritic seashells separated by groups of enamel disc-shaped beads: five or six black beads framed by three turquoise beads. The latter constitute the extremities. The materials used were those much prized by peoples of Lower Nubia at the end of the third millennium and the first half of the second millennium B.C.
